Map a CAPE bus to another CAPE bus to avoid phase shift issues:
Bus -> To Map
1805 -> 56034
7609 -> 7607
3014-> 750006
3532->3208
5340->750385
1099->1093

# Add the following lines:
750293,'GLDDEN38    ', 138.0000,1, 222,   7,   1,1.00043, -63.1892,1.10000,0.90000,1.10000,0.90000
750294,'GLDDEN38    ', 138.0000,1, 222,   7,   1,1.00043, -63.1892,1.10000,0.90000,1.10000,0.90000


# Delete the following lines:
750200,349700,'1 ', 6.52000E-4, 9.65600E-3,   0.17066, 1364.00, 1528.00, 1793.00,  0.00000,  0.00000,  0.00000,  0.00000,1,1,  19.84, 222,1.0000
